title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view, such as the Navigator, is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127, the tool items move below the label.
EB: The tool items should stay aligned with the label even when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
1. Launch the application on Linux using build 20011127.
2. Open the Navigator view.
3. Resize the view to be smaller.
4. Check if the tool items move below the label.
